column1: #Text=Ontario Votes 2007 : Interview with Green candidate Martin Hyde , Ottawa West-Nepean
#Text=is running for the Green Party of Ontario in the Ontario provincial election , in the Ottawa West-Nepean riding .
#Text=Wikinews ' Nick Moreau interviewed him regarding his values , his experience , and his campaign .
#Text=Note that he did not answer the question " Of the decisions made by Ontario 's 38th Legislative Assembly , which was the most beneficial to your electoral district ?
